management_and_clinical_course: Treatment plan: ["Treat for syphilis with a single dose of benzathine penicillin (2.4 million units)", "Treat for chancroid with azithromycin (1g PO) or ciprofloxacin (500mg bid for 3 days) or erythromycin (500mg qds for 7 days)", "If HIV-positive, consider adding aciclovir (400 mg tds for 7 days)"] Clinical response: ["pain had resolved", "ulcers were all healing after 1 week of antibiotic therapy"]
final_diagnosis: Diagnosis: Genital ulcer disease due to Chancroid Confirmation method: positive culture for Haemophilus ducreyi Evidence: ["clinical presentation consistent with genital ulcer disease", "negative serology for syphilis and chancroid", "positive culture for Haemophilus ducreyi"]
